# init(disbursementRequest:)

**Initializer**

Initializes and returns a new payment authorization view controller with the provided disbursement request.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor convenience init(disbursementRequest request: PKDisbursementRequest)
```

## Parameters

- **request**: A [doc://com.apple.passkit/documentation/PassKit/PKDisbursementRequest].

## Creating a payment authorization view controller

- **init(paymentRequest:)**: Initializes and returns a payment authorization view controller.
